document_data.caption: An ice chest.
document_data.name: Ice Chest
document_data.mainbody: '''Ice chests''', were insulated storage containers used to keep food or drink cool.
document_data.Description: Ice chest resembled small insulated wardrobes.
document_data.Availability: * ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold ice chests that could easily hold a dozen [[jar]]s at a cost of 35 [[gold piece]]s.

Notable Users.Businesses: * The [[Jade Jug]], a luxury inn in [[Waterdeep]], had an icebox placed by the bed of every suite. These were used to store chilled [[wine]] and [[shrimp]] snacks.
